SWADA.Title: SWADE Targeted Damage
SWADA.soakTitle: Targeted Damage: Roll to Soak Wounds for {name}?
SWADA.soakDmgPrompt: {name} is about to take {wounds}. Do you want to attempt to Soak?
SWADA.ChoosePlayerPrompt: Which player would like to manage the damage for {name}?
SWADA.rerollSoakTitle: Targeted Damage: Reroll to Soak Wounds for {name}?
SWADA.rerollSoakDmgPrompt: {name} is about to take {wounds}. Do you want to reroll the Soak roll?
SWADA.adjustDamagePrompt: Adjust damage for any abilities and effects {name} might have?
SWADA.soakedAll: {name} Soaked all Wounds and is not Shaken!
